title: Report a Pothole
description: A citizen wants to report a large pothole on a city street using the 311 service.

tasks.description: Collect the location of the pothole (address or intersection) and the citizen's contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the location and reporter's details.

tasks.description: Create a new service request in the public works management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new service ticket for the pothole repair.

tasks.description: Provide the citizen with a service request number so they can track the status of the repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the citizen a tracking number for their request.
